mapper.select: select mano as attachNo ,uploadPath ,fileName ,fileType ,mailno as refNo from mailattach where mailno = #{refNo}
select mano as attachNo ,uploadPath ,fileName ,fileType ,mailNo as refNo from mailattach where mano = #{attachNo}

select 'MT' || trim(nvl(max(to_char(to_number(substr(mano,3))+1,'000000')),'000001')) as attachno from mailattach
union
select nvl(null,'MT000001') as attachno from dual where not exists (select mano from mailattach)
